title: BugSplat
body: I can select my champion and everything previous, i lock in and wait for the battle to begin, then when that 10 seconds ends i get a flash of the logo and then a bugsplat accompanied by a "reconnect" button which if i click flashes up the logo again and the problem loops like that. Please help me, i have disabled GameBar, I've removed the Logitech dlls that caused this issue before and tried everything the boards had to say, such as reinstalling and repairing, nothing is working for me; please help. Any support is appriciated. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
Okay, so I had this issue as well... However my client was completely stable 2 days ago, the last time that I played, so I knew that it wasn't my computer was bad.. Turns out that windows 10 had auto updated recently and my problems came after that happened. I rolled back the update to a previous version, and wha la it worked. So if you can figure out how to do that, give it a try. It should work and you'll be back up and running like normal. 
Hope this helps! :) 
Cheers!
I still cannot fix it either.

Bugsplats are typically the result of poor driver interactions or issues with your hardware. I suggest taking a look at our [Bugsplat & Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) for a list of common solutions.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
